PyNSO
===============================

version number: 1.0
author: Anthony Shaw

Overview
--------

A Python client library for Cisco NSO (previously tail-f)

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install pynso


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/DimensionDataCBUSydney/pynso.git
    $ python setup.py install
